name: MongoDB Enterprise V-81891
title: MongoDB operations permit arbitrary JavaScript expressions to be run directly on the server.
script:
javascriptEnabled="javascriptEnabled"
checkfile="/etc/mongod.conf"
if [ -f $checkfile ]
then
       log=$(grep -i "${javascriptEnabled}" "${checkfile}" | grep -Ev "#")
    if [ -z "$log" ]
    then
       echo "Can't find $javascriptEnabled within $checkfile."
       exit 1
    else 
       echo " $javascriptEnabled exist within $checkfile."
       exit 0
    fi
    else
       echo "$checkfile does not exist."
       exit 1
    fi
